Heat vinegar until just before boiling. Combine basil and vingegar in a glass bottle, and let cool. Seal tightly, and infuse for two weeks. Strain the vinegar into a fresh bottle, and add a sprig of basil. Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #189
